values.desc: Gets the list of all connected MIDI devices.

values.code: openBluetoothDevice(bluetoothDevice: BluetoothDevice!, listener: MidiManager.OnDeviceOpenedListener!, handler: Handler!)
values.desc: Opens a Bluetooth MIDI device for reading and writing.

values.code: openDevice(deviceInfo: MidiDeviceInfo!, listener: MidiManager.OnDeviceOpenedListener!, handler: Handler!)
values.desc: Opens a MIDI device for reading and writing.
Registers a callback to receive notifications when MIDI devices are added and removed.
Callback class used for clients to receive MIDI device added and removed notifications
Listener class used for receiving the results of openDevice and openBluetoothDevice
